name: dral2-o
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wb(wal(s2, w0), wal(s2, w1)))

stmt.origin: albidh(s2, wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0, w1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wb(wal(s2, w0), wal(s2, w1)))
-| wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wal(s2, wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
-| wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wb(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wb(wal(s2, w0), wal(s2, w1)))
-| wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wal(s2, wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
-| wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wb(w0, w1))

body.origin: |- wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wal(s2, wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wb(wal(s2, w0), wal(s2, w1)))
-| wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wb(w0, w1))

comment: Formula-building lemma for use with the Distinctor Reduction Theorem. Part of Theorem 9.4 of [Megill] p. 448 (p. 16 of preprint). Version of ~ dral2 using ~ ax-c11 . (Contributed by NM, 27-Feb-2005.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
